archimate:BusinessActor.name: Trustee
archimate:BusinessActor.documentation: An Identity Owner entrusted with specific identity control responsibilities by another Identity Owner or with specific governance responsibilities by a Governance Framework. See Recovery Key Trustee and Sovrin Trustee. See Appendix C.
